lines.text:
[to Amalia]
You've lost so much weight! I thought your ass was Jodie Foster's chin!
You're not too bright. I like that in a man.
Dad sends me to church all the time, hoping I'll become straight.
Catholic church? Good luck!
Any vision problems?
Well, my right eye is like I'm looking through a tampon.
You do it again, I'm gonna get out the whip.
Promises, promises!
Lina and I almost made it once.
What?!
Yeah. We had this electric moment when you said to me, "Why do you have to be gay?" and I said to you, "Me? Why do you have to be a woman?"
So what do we think of Samantha Frank?
She's a vacuum with nipples.
This is for you.
[He hands Monty a bust.]
For good luck?
Well, you always wanted me to give you head.
You look like you caught your balls in your zipper, Dr. Dave.
You taught me black was slimming, but, if you insist, one fat pig coming up.
Is that my shirt? Or are you eating an onion bagel?
I might as well have a cigarette. It's not like it's going to kill me, right?

[Regarding a painting]
Look, it's Macauley Culkin throwing up a soft-shell crab!
I've got ten days 'til I croak, right?
